name: Pinball Machine
description:
Controls:

Left and right arrow keys to control flippers

Hold down arrow to retract plunger

Core Features:

4 active bumpers - gives you score, and deflects pinball

1 bash toy - gives you score, and deflects pinball

2 bumpers - gives you score, and deflects pinball
